CEO President  Car Insurance, Home Insurance, Life Insurance, and Retirement Planning, and Tax Plans

I teach people how to properly protect themselves with insurance products. With only 3% of all people carrying great coverage, I see almost everyone can use a little help. I love giving advice. Most agents quote on price, I quote on "how much money do you want if you will never walk?"I teach people how to get free renters insurance or free life insurance when they combine their auto insurance with renters insurance. Full coverage covers the vehicle, not the injuries past $15k. How far will $15k go if you are going to spend your life in a wheelchair? How far will it go if you have a shattered hip?  I teach people how to protect themselves. Insurance is for the big accidents not the small claims. If you hit someone: rates can go up, carfax value could drop car value by thousandscould get sued personallyI ask my clients and friends to call me back to back to back in an emergency.Jayson Hoffer480-518-0747 8am-10pmjhoffer@farmersagent.comSpecialties:  Auto InsuranceCar Insurance Homeowners Insurance Business Insurance General Liability Insurance Term Life Insurance Cash Value Permanent Life Insurance Key Man Life Insurance Whole Life Insurance ( we have better products today, but this is available) Health Insurance Realtor Insurance CPA & Accountant Insurance Commercial Real Estate Insurance Commercial Habitational Insurance Commercial Auto Insurance Commercial Wholesale Distr Insurance Retirement Planning, 401k, SIMPLE, SEP, IRA, Roth, Traditional, Mutual Funds Restaurant Insurance Hotel Insurance Umbrella Insurance Workers Compensation Insurance Insurance Risk MedicareHigh Risk InsuranceBusiness owner Life InsuranceAfter 13 years of being an agent I can guide you through your claims. You may have gone through 1, I have been through 1000! Let me help! Call now for a free quote, I will teach you how to save money with me, or keeping your current policy if it makes sense. http://www.farmers.com/disclaimer/legal
President /CEO Car, Home, Life Insurance, Retirement Planning and More!

I love helping people. Whether its your insurance, social media, locating a career, matchmaking or anything else let me know. Lately I have been offering people an hour of social media training in exchange for me learning how to build their business and showing them what I do with insurance. Its been incredible. You get to build your business while saving money on your insurance. When you are a client of mine I help introduce you to my database. Does your current insurance company help your business?You may have car insurance, your home insurance may be ok. Why settle for ok when you can get the best coverage at a fraction of the cost. I will teach you the scams and take the small convenience coverage's and apply that money to protecting you.Jayson Hoffer480-518-0747My agency is dedicated to being the right choice for auto insurance, home (homeowners and renters), life insurance, business insurance, umbrellas, boat and recreational vehicle insurance, and a whole lot more. As your personal, local Farmers agent, you have my commitment that I'll help you develop the coverage that's right for your life - at a price that's great value for your insurance dollar. No insurance company offers more discounts than we do, and our industry-leading HelpPoint¬Æ claims service means you can count on us to be there when you need us. Give me a call 480-518-0747 and I'll give you more information on all the many products and discounts my Farmers agency offers, whether it's auto insurance, homeowners insurance, life insurance or something more specialized. I love to help Realtors, Mortgage Lenders, title companies, attorneys and Cpa's grow their business. Do you know any of these people that I can help. Call me at 480-518-0747!http://www.ilovefarmers.comFind me at Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/jaysonhofferIf you are unemployed and want my help looking for a job schedule a facetime apt with me 480-948-6115I love helping people with their car and home insurance.

I love to help people grow their businesses or help people find a new career. If you are in business and need more help, we should talk! I use LinkedIn and Facebook to generate around 20 referrals a week. Do you receive my referrals? If not, we need to talk. If you want my referrals we have to meet face to face, show integrity with returned calls, or send business or referrals our way. You should also stay in front of me!I see around a 1000 people a year in my office, without staying in front of me, you may be left in the dust! Please call me 480-518-0747, text me, send a letter, or lastly email me! Commenting on LinkedIn or Facebook goes a long way in staying in front of people!I love working with Divorce attorneys, Probate attorneys also known as family law attorneys, Engineers, Accountants, Doctors, Nurses and other professionals! How many other insurance agents do you know with 80 recommendations? Executives, CEO's, CFO's, COO's,  Presidents, Vice Presidents often enjoy my level of accuracy and thoroughness. Do you want to work with someone that partially completes a task or completes a task?480-948-6115 Let's do a face to face review. I know your time is valuable. So is mine, let's make sure it's done right the first time instead of after/during a claim.

I run a movie group completely for fun and entertainment. We see movies, go to dinner, comedy events, and other various events. Being we have over a thousand members I can negotiate with the restaurants that we go to to get discounts. Some restaurants give us free appetizers ( Bj's Brewery, Chompies) while others give us 20% off. http://www.valleymoviegroup.com
I worked as a photographers mate. I loved it but did not like the Navy enough to re-enlist.
